chapters.title: Chapter 1: High Chasaline
chapters.info: Katerine Alruddin, p. 62 (66)—Aes Sedai of the Red Ajah. Though she keeps it secret, she is actually of the Black Ajah, and has been for twelve years. She was captured by Rand during the battle at Dumai's Wells. If something happened to Galina, the leader of the Aes Sedai after Rand was kidnapped, Katerine was to take over for her as the next strongest Red sister.
